ygData.subject: monk on the move
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a Freeport monk who just hit level 14 and am wondering what to do next. My circuit of N Ro, E Comm, and W Comm (parts of it, anyway) have gotten me this
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a Freeport monk who just hit level 14 and am wondering what to do next.
My circuit of N Ro, E Comm, and W Comm (parts of it, anyway) have gotten me
this far, but opponents now are getting to be either too easy around there
or still way too tough, so I want a zone that's going to have a good share
of blues for me, plus whites, yellows, and realistic reds I can fight in
groups.

A 20th level Necro friend of mine wants to bring me to Highpass to help me
level quickly, but I'm nervous that if he's not around I may not be able to
solo. Any thoughts on this?

Anybody else have suggestions? I'd prefer to stay on the eastern side of
Antonica or on Faydwer.

Also, can I get some recommendations on jewelry that's in my price range?
I've got all of 30 plat to my name.

__________________________
Moorgard, monk striving for virtue
